summary: Olive E. Wagner is identified as an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCA). She appears in payroll and certification reports from April 1978 to December 1978. These documents list her name, and in some cases, her salary and gross pay during the specified periods. The documents suggest she was a staff member of the committee during its investigation.
significance: Olive E. Wagner's significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations. As a staff member, she was part of the team involved in the investigation, though the specific nature and impact of her role are not detailed in these documents.
